newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russian Cen.Bank sells 112.5 bln rbls bills, bonds.
newsitem.headline: Russian Cen.Bank sells 112.5 bln rbls bills, bonds.

text.p: The Central Bank sold 112.498 billion roubles nominal of GKO discount Treasury bills and OFZ interest-bearing government bonds on behalf of the Finance Ministry on Friday, the bank's open-market operations department said.
The bank made the following transactions:

The bank did not say at what price the paper was sold. The 21076 issue closed on Friday at 95.37 percent, the 24011 issue closed at 102.59 percent, the 24012 issue closed at 100.82 percent and the 24014 issue closed at 97.62 percent.

Apart from intervening on its own account for liquidity-smoothing and monetary policy purposes, the Central Bank buys and sells securities as part of its management of the Finance Ministry's debt and asset portfolio.
Full details of recent central bank transactions in the secondary market for the Finance Ministry can be seen on CBGKOSEC.
